Team.title: Who We Are
Team.GabrielaDescription: Gabriela Tafur Nader, featured on the Forbes 30 Under 30 Colombia list, holds an MBA from Stanford. She was the host of Colombia's number one prime-time TV show, built a massive following across Latin America, and was Miss Colombia and a Top 5 finalist in Miss Universe. She is also an angel investor focused on Latin America. With roots in law, media, and technology, she is building the future of entertainment: bold, mobile-first, and proudly Latino.
Team.EstebanDescription: Originally from Mexico City, Esteban holds a dual degree in Computer Science and an MBA from MIT. He is the former founder of a startup and CTO of Akampa.com. He has over 7 years of experience developing software in fast-paced, agile environments.
Team.LorenaDescription: Expert in telenovela and microdrama screenwriting. Over 19 years of experience in Latin American content. Head of Content at Caracol TV for more than 12 years.
Team.DiegoDescription: Diego is an expert in short-form content and mini-dramas. He has over 25 years of experience in Latin American media. He is a multiple recipient of the India Catalina Awards, TVyNovelas Awards, and international accolades for excellence in storytelling and production. Former general producer at Caracol Televisión.

Shows.description: Soon you'll be able to enjoy a wide variety of original series and microdramas, designed to entertain you anytime, anywhere. Stay tuned for our updates!
Shows.tpeDesc: Mónica had a simple, happy life with her daughter Elisa… until betrayal struck like a dagger. Her husband Tomás, blinded by ambition and by Emilia —a woman willing to do anything to take his power— unleashed a nightmare that will put the most sacred thing at risk: the life of their daughter...
Shows.hdpDesc: In the Kopel Mansion, blood runs thick… but secrets run deeper. On the 75th birthday of tycoon Germán Kopel, an unexpected revelation reshuffles the entire family gameboard: he's dying. But before he goes, he must name his successor. What began as a celebration turns into a ruthless war of heirs. As children and sons-in-law fight for the business throne, the real scandal brews in silence: Lorena, the patriarch's fiancée, is hiding a forbidden love with his youngest son, Santiago. A romance neither has been able to bury… and that threatens to set everything on fire.
Shows.etmTitle: In Love with the Mafia Biker
Shows.etmDesc: Joaquín, a man marked by a dark past, returns with his leather jacket, his roaring motorcycle, and a heart still beating for Natalia, a kind woman who thought all was lost. But love never comes alone. Alongside it is Ema, his seductive, ambitious twin sister, willing to do anything to claim the throne of the Gran King… and Joaquín. Lurking nearby: Carlos, a soulless mafioso thirsty for revenge, ready to kill for power.
Shows.aetDesc: They say you never forget your first love… but what happens when he returns as a global football star, and you're no longer the same? Isabel had it all figured out: the perfect fiancé, a rising career, a buried past. Until Julián came back. More handsome. More famous. More determined to win her back. What started as a photo shoot… will become a battle between reason and the heart. Between what hurts... and what still beats.
Shows.leiDesc: A death disguised as an accident. A nurse who returns… to avenge her sister. A house where everyone hides something. Even the man who could save her… or destroy her. Valeria came to serve. But she came to uncover the truth. And she won't stop until she finds the killer. Even if it breaks her heart. Even if it costs her life. How far would you go for love of your sister?
Shows.ethyDesc: Natalia was given away as part of a contract. Her fate: to become the perfect wife of the man who bought her freedom. But when true love appears in the most unexpected place —in the eyes of her fiancé's younger brother— everything falls apart. In a mansion of luxury and strict rules, where every kiss is betrayal and every glance a chasm, a secret war is waged: that of a woman who dares to love the one man she was forbidden to touch.
Shows.lveTitle: The Veteran in Love with the Billionaire Mechanic
Shows.lveDesc: She sold desserts from a beat-up Renault 12. He, hidden behind a mechanic's jacket, owned an empire. And without knowing it, they were bound by a past no one dared to name… Mónica just wanted to earn a living with dignity. Carlos just wanted a dessert. Andrés, their sick son —though no one knew it yet— just wanted to see them together before he died. But when love arrives in disguise, no lie can stop it.

Privacy.description: Read our privacy notice to understand how idilio.tv collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Learn about your rights and our data practices.
Privacy.intro: This Privacy Notice explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use the IDILIO.TV service (that term and "IDILIO.TV content" are defined in the IDILIO.TV Terms of Use available at Idilio.tv/terms) or anywhere we display or reference this Privacy Notice. It also explains what your privacy rights are and how to exercise them. Certain features or applications that are part of the IDILIO.TV service may provide you with additional contextual privacy information or options, in addition to the information and options described in this Privacy Notice.
Privacy.contactInfo: If you have questions about this Privacy Notice, about our use of your personal information, or about how to exercise your privacy rights, at privacy@Idilio.tv. For general questions about the IDILIO.TV service, your account, or how to contact customer service, please visit our help center (help.Idilio.tv).

sectionA.title: Section A: Our collection, use, and disclosure of personal information
sectionA.categoriesTitle: Categories of personal information we collect
sectionA.categoriesIntro: We collect the following categories of personal information about you:

personalData.title: Personal data
personalData.content: when you create your IDILIO.TV account, we collect your contact information (such as your email address) and authentication information for your login (such as a password). Depending on how you subsequently configure your account and payment method, and what features you use, we also collect one or more of the following: first and last name, phone number, postal address, gender, date of birth, and other identifiers you provide to us.

paymentDetails.title: Payment details
paymentDetails.content: we collect your payment data and other information to process your payments, including your payment history, billing address, as well as gift cards and promotional offers you have redeemed.

purchaseInfo.title: Purchase information
purchaseInfo.content: we collect information about your purchases, such as the information you provide to us when you make a purchase with IDILIO.TV, your purchase history and other products purchased or considered (for example, those in your shopping cart), and your general shopping habits.

accountProfile.title: IDILIO.TV account/profile information
accountProfile.content: we collect information associated with your IDILIO.TV account and/or IDILIO.TV profiles on your account (such as profile name and icon, IDILIO.TV game aliases, ratings and comments you provide about IDILIO.TV content), your "My List" (list of titles to watch), "continue watching" information, account/profile settings, and options related to your use of the IDILIO.TV service.

usageInfo.title: Usage information
usageInfo.content: we collect information about your interaction with the IDILIO.TV service (including playback events, such as play, pause, etc.), choices made when interacting with interactive titles, your activity in IDILIO.TV games (such as gameplay, use and interaction within games, and progress information or saved games), your viewing and gaming history on IDILIO.TV, search queries on the IDILIO.TV service, and other information about your use and interaction with the IDILIO.TV service (such as app clicks, text entered, pages viewed, access time and duration, and camera/photo access for QR code functionality and similar).

advertisingInfo.title: Advertising information
advertisingInfo.content: we collect information about ads on the IDILIO.TV service ("Ads," as defined in the IDILIO.TV Terms of Use) that you see or interact with, device information (such as resettable device identifiers), IP addresses, and information provided by Advertising Companies (such as information about your likely interests that such companies have collected or inferred from your visits to other websites and applications). We use this information to support Ads (including behavioral ads according to your preferences).

deviceNetworkInfo.title: Device and network information
deviceNetworkInfo.content: we collect information about your computer or other IDILIO.TV-compatible devices you may use to access our service (such as Smart TVs, mobile devices, set-top boxes, gaming systems, or other streaming devices), your network and your network devices. This information includes: (i) device identifiers (ID) or other unique identifiers, including those of your network devices (such as your router) and IDILIO.TV-compatible devices connected to your network; (ii) IP addresses (which may be used to tell us the general location of your device, such as your city, state/province, and zip code); (iii) device and software characteristics (such as type and configuration), referral source (for example, referral URL), standard browser and application log information, and connection information including connection type (such as wifi or cellular); (iv) performance data such as crash reports, timestamps, and debug log messages; and (vi) cookie data, resettable device identifiers, advertising identifiers, and other unique identifiers (described below in the "Cookies and other Technologies" section).

communications.title: Communications
communications.content: if you communicate with IDILIO.TV (for example, by contacting customer service via online chat or phone call) or participate in our surveys or feedback requests (for example, when canceling the service), we collect the content of such communications. We also collect details of communications we send to you (for example, via email, push notifications, text messages, or within the IDILIO.TV service), and information about your interaction with those communications.

sensitiveData.title: Sensitive personal data
sensitiveData.content: IDILIO.TV does not collect personal data that is considered sensitive.

Privacy.sourcesTitle: Where we collect personal information from
Privacy.sourcesIntro: We collect your personal information from the following sources:

directlyFromYou.title: Directly from you
directlyFromYou.content: when you register for the IDILIO.TV service, update your IDILIO.TV account or profile, purchase products or services from us, correspond with us, or respond to our surveys, you may provide (and we will collect) the following categories of personal information: personal data, payment details, purchase information, account/profile information, and communications.

automatically.title: Automatically when you use our service
automatically.content: we automatically collect the following categories of personal information in connection with your use of the IDILIO.TV service: IDILIO.TV account/profile information, purchase information, usage information, advertising information, device and network information, and communications.

fromPartners.title: From Partners whose products and services you use
fromPartners.content: we may collect the following categories of personal information about you from third parties whose services you use to access, pay for, or interact with the IDILIO.TV service ("Partners"): personal data, payment details, usage information, and device and network information. Our Partners may include your TV manufacturer, your Internet service provider, streaming device provider, mobile phone carrier, or other companies that charge payment for the IDILIO.TV service. For example, Partners may provide us with: (i) personal data (such as your email address), (ii) device and network information (such as IP addresses, device ID or other unique identifiers) or other personal information to activate the IDILIO.TV service, or present IDILIO.TV content to you through parts of the Partner's user interface; (iii) payment details (such as information associated with prepaid promotions and billing data) if the Partner is helping with billing or collecting payment for the IDILIO.TV service; and (iv) search queries and IDILIO.TV-related commands you make through Partner devices or voice assistant platforms.

fromOtherSources.title: From other sources
fromOtherSources.content: we may collect the following categories of personal information about you from other sources: personal data, payment details, and device and network information. These sources include:
fromOtherSources.serviceProviders: Service Providers such as vendors, agents, and contractors who collect or provide personal information to IDILIO.TV in connection with services they perform on our behalf ("Service Providers"). This may include Service Providers such as those who: (i) help us determine a general geographic location based on your IP address to personalize our service and for other uses consistent with this Privacy Notice; (ii) provide us with information to secure our systems, prevent fraud, and help us protect the security of IDILIO.TV and our users; (iii) provide us with payment processing services, including payment or balance information, or updates to that information; and (iv) provide IDILIO.TV games, or parts or functions of those games, as part of the IDILIO.TV service (for example, some IDILIO.TV games are licensed by IDILIO.TV but operated by Service Providers).
fromOtherSources.marketingProviders: IDILIO.TV Marketing Providers when you interact with marketing campaigns that promote the IDILIO.TV service or IDILIO.TV content. See the "Cookies and other Technologies" section below for more details.
fromOtherSources.thirdPartySites: Third-party sites and forums where we provide support for the IDILIO.TV service (such as an online support forum for IDILIO.TV customer service or for a particular IDILIO.TV game).
fromOtherSources.publicSources: Publicly available sources, such as public posts on social media platforms and other information available through public databases, in accordance with applicable laws.
fromOtherSources.advertisingCompanies: Advertising Companies: we may collect advertising information about you from other sources to support Ads, including the following (collectively referred to as "Advertising Companies"): (i) Advertisers who publish Ads on IDILIO.TV ("Advertisers") may provide us with unique identifiers (for example, cookies or resettable device identifiers), (ii) demographic and other information for the purpose of delivering Ads to you;
fromOtherSources.adServiceProviders: Ad service providers that facilitate the sale, operations, and management of Ads ("Ad Service Providers");
fromOtherSources.measurementCompanies: Ad measurement companies that help IDILIO.TV and Advertisers understand the effectiveness of Ads ("Ad Measurement Companies"); and
fromOtherSources.informationProviders: Online and offline information providers to support Ads

Privacy.howWeUseTitle: How we use your personal information
Privacy.howWeUseIntro: We use your personal information to provide, maintain, improve, and promote the IDILIO.TV service, and to communicate with you. This involves using the personal information categories mentioned above for the following purposes:

provideService.title: Provide our service
provideService.content: including making personalized recommendations of IDILIO.TV content that we think may be of interest to you. This may also include personalizing and optimizing service features and functionality (such as how recommendations are presented to you), and localizing IDILIO.TV content relevant to your region, in accordance with our content partners' license terms.

manageBusiness.title: Manage and operate our business
manageBusiness.content: including purposes such as processing payments and any gift cards you redeem, sending you transactional communications (such as confirmation of your subscription start date or information about changes to your account), determining your Internet service provider to help with network troubleshooting, responding to your inquiries and requests, and assisting you with operational requests such as password resets.

researchImprove.title: Research, analyze, and improve our services
researchImprove.content: for example, by analyzing and understanding our audience to improve our services and optimize IDILIO.TV content selection and service delivery. This may also include processing your personal information in connection with any survey you participate in.

enableIntegrations.title: Enable integrations and promotions with Partners
enableIntegrations.content: so that our Partners can promote the IDILIO.TV service and make it available to you through Partner devices and integrations, according to the specific relationship you have with the Partner.

sendMarketing.title: Send informational and marketing messages
sendMarketing.content: including news and promotional communications about our service, new features, available IDILIO.TV content, and special offers, as well as IDILIO.TV marketing on third-party services. Any of these messages, including IDILIO.TV marketing on third-party services, may be personalized for you or according to your likely interests. Please see the "Communication and marketing preferences" section below to change your communication preferences.

supportAdvertising.title: Support Ads
supportAdvertising.content: including providing, analyzing, managing, improving, optimizing, selecting, delivering, and measuring Ads. We use the following categories of personal information for this purpose: personal data, account/profile information, usage information, advertising information, and device and network information. We use your personal information to present Ads to you.

securityFraud.title: Security, protection, and fraud prevention
securityFraud.content: including securing our systems, protecting our business, and investigating, preventing, and detecting prohibited or illegal activities and other security/technical issues.

compliance.title: Comply with the law and enforce the IDILIO.TV Terms of Use
compliance.content: including satisfying applicable legislation, regulation, legal processes, or government requests, and protecting against harm to the rights, property, or safety of IDILIO.TV, its users, or the public, as required or permitted by law, as well as to enforce applicable community guidelines. This also includes determining which IDILIO.TV registration offers you are eligible for and whether a particular device is authorized to use the account in accordance with the IDILIO.TV Terms of Use.

Privacy.disclosureTitle: Who do we disclose your personal information to?
Privacy.disclosureIntro: We may disclose your personal information to the following parties:

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.content: we use Service Providers to perform services on our behalf or to help us provide services to you. For example, we employ Service Providers to provide communications, security, infrastructure and IT, game-related services, to personalize and improve our service, and to process payments. We do not authorize them to use or disclose your personal information except in connection with providing their services (which may include maintaining and improving their own services). To help maintain the security of our service and users, we and our Service Providers may monitor and record the content of communications (such as chat functionality) to identify harmful behaviors, security risks, and violations of the IDILIO.TV Terms of Use and community guidelines. Our Service Providers may process your personal information for the following purposes: provide our service; manage and operate our business; research, analyze, and improve our services; send informational and marketing messages; for security, protection, and fraud prevention; and to comply with the law and enforce the IDILIO.TV Terms of Use.

partners.title: Partners
partners.content: if you have a relationship with one or more of our Partners, we may share certain personal information with them to fulfill their requests, in compliance with applicable law. For example, depending on which Partner services you use, we may share personal information so that IDILIO.TV content and features can be suggested to you through the Partner's user interface. Partners may process your personal information for the following purposes: manage and operate our business; research, analyze, and improve our services; enable integrations and promotions with Partners; and send informational and marketing messages.

marketingProviders.title: IDILIO.TV marketing providers
marketingProviders.content: when we perform IDILIO.TV marketing on third-party services, some of those services, as well as the marketing service providers we use to acquire, deliver, optimize, or measure our marketing (collectively, "IDILIO.TV Marketing Providers") may receive information from us (for example, the steps completed in the IDILIO.TV subscription process). Common uses of this type of information include measuring effectiveness and optimizing our marketing campaigns, and avoiding marketing to a device of a person who is already an IDILIO.TV member. IDILIO.TV uses contractual and technical measures designed to prevent IDILIO.TV Marketing Providers from accessing information about specific series or movie titles you have selected, URLs you have accessed, or the series or movies you have watched on our service. We do not share information about the series or movie title selections you have watched on our service.

advertisingCompanies.title: Advertising Companies
advertisingCompanies.content: we may disclose certain personal information to Advertising Companies (see definition above) for the purpose of selecting Ads displayed on IDILIO.TV, facilitating interaction with Ads, and measuring and improving Ad effectiveness.

promotionalCollaborations.title: Promotional collaborations
promotionalCollaborations.content: we may collaborate with third parties to offer joint promotions.

corporateTransactions.title: Corporate transactions
corporateTransactions.content: in connection with a reorganization, restructuring, merger, or sale, or other transfer of assets, we will transfer personal information, provided that the receiving party accepts to respect your personal information in a manner consistent with this Privacy Notice.

securityDisclosure.title: Security, protection, and fraud prevention
securityDisclosure.content: IDILIO.TV and its Service Providers may disclose your personal information to third parties when we reasonably consider that such disclosure is necessary for security, protection, and fraud prevention purposes.

legalCompliance.title: Legal compliance and enforcement of IDILIO.TV Terms
legalCompliance.content: we may disclose your personal information as necessary to comply with applicable law, regulation, legal process, or government request, and to carry out the processing necessary to protect against harm to the rights, property, or safety of IDILIO.TV, its users, or the public, as required or permitted by law.

Privacy.internationalTransfer: IDILIO.TV operates from several countries around the world (including, for example, the United States, Colombia, and Mexico), as do its Service Providers, Partners, and other third parties to whom we may need to disclose your personal information, as described above. This means that when you use or interact with IDILIO.TV, your personal information may be transferred to other countries that have different data protection laws than the country where you reside. However, whenever we transfer personal information to other countries, we will ensure that personal information is transferred in accordance with applicable data protection laws and this Privacy Notice.

sectionB.title: Section B: Your rights and controls

right1.title: 1. Access, rectification, update, or deletion of your personal information
right1.content: you have the right to confirm whether or not we process your personal information and to access and receive a copy of the personal information we process about you. You may also correct or update outdated or inaccurate personal information, or request that we delete the personal information we retain about you

sectionB.right1Details: To request a copy of your personal information, please visit Idilio.tv/account/get-my-information. Additionally, in the "Account" section of our website, you can access and update information about your account, including your contact information, payment information, and various data related to your account. You must be logged in to access the "Account" section. For information about deletion, deletion (cancellation), and retention of personal information, see Idilio.tv/help/delete-data. Portability and download of your personal information: you may request the portability of, or download a copy of, your personal information. If you are the account holder, to download a copy of your personal information go to: Idilio.tv/account/get-my-information. For more information, please see: Idilio.tv/help/download-data.

right2.title: 2. Objection, restriction, and withdrawal of consent
right2.content: you may object to or request that we restrict the processing of your personal information. If we have collected and processed your personal information with your consent, then you may withdraw your consent at any time. Withdrawing your consent will not affect the legality of any processing carried out before your withdrawal, nor will it affect the processing of your personal information carried out on grounds other than consent. For more information, see Idilio.tv/help/data-rights.

right3.title: 3. Right to file a complaint
right3.content: you have the right to file a complaint with a data protection authority about our collection and use of your personal information, but we encourage you to first contact us for any questions or concerns.

right4.title: 4. Right not to be subject to automated decisions
right4.content: you may have the right not to be subject to a decision made solely by automated means, when such decision produces a legal effect on you or similarly significantly affects you. You may exercise the rights described above when we receive a verified request from you, in accordance with applicable laws

emailsTexts.title: Emails and text messages
emailsTexts.content: if you no longer wish to receive certain communications from us by email or text message, please access the "Notification Settings" option for the corresponding profile within the "Account" section of our website. Alternatively, click the "unsubscribe" link in the email or reply "STOP" (or as indicated) to the text message. Please note that you cannot unsubscribe from transactional messages we send to you, such as messages related to your account transactions.

pushNotifications.title: Push notifications
pushNotifications.content: you may opt to receive mobile push notifications from IDILIO.TV. IDILIO.TV will send you push notifications occasionally according to the notification preferences you have set on your mobile device. If you subsequently decide that you no longer wish to receive these notifications, you can use your mobile device settings to disable them. Please note that some individual IDILIO.TV games may have their own push notifications. We also offer push notifications on certain web browsers. If you accept to receive those notifications and then decide that you no longer wish to receive them, you can use your browser settings to disable them.

matchingIdentifiers.title: IDILIO.TV communications with matching identifiers
matchingIdentifiers.content: some third-party services allow us to reach users with online marketing about IDILIO.TV content or about the IDILIO.TV service by sending protected contact information to that third party. Protected contact information means that we use technologies to convert the original contact information into a value (typically a long alphanumeric sequence) that by itself cannot reveal your identity or contact information. The third party compares IDILIO.TV's protected contact information with the protected contact information in their own database, and there will only be a match if you have used the same contact information with both IDILIO.TV and the third party. If there is a match, IDILIO.TV can then choose whether to send you IDILIO.TV marketing on that third-party service, and can better optimize and measure the effectiveness of such marketing. You can indicate your preferences regarding Communications with matching identifiers in the "Privacy and data settings" option (for the corresponding profile) within the "Account" section of our website.

marketingCookies.title: IDILIO.TV service marketing using cookies and similar technologies
marketingCookies.content: to exercise options regarding cookies or resettable device identifiers collected for IDILIO.TV service marketing or IDILIO.TV content marketing purposes on third-party services, use the tools described in the "Cookies and other Technologies" section below.

behavioralAdvertising.title: Behavioral advertising options
behavioralAdvertising.content: we respect your preferences regarding behavioral advertising, and you can disable behavioral ads at any time by changing the "Behavioral Advertising" setting located in the "Privacy and data settings" menu (for the corresponding profile) of the "Account" section of our website. If the behavioral ads option is disabled, you will still see Ads, but they will be non-behavioral ads. No opt-out option is provided on a Kids profile, as we do not perform behavioral advertising on Kids profiles.

digitalAdvertisingAlliance.title: Digital Advertising Alliance opt-out control
digitalAdvertisingAlliance.content: IDILIO.TV supports the following self-regulatory programs, which provide additional privacy options for behavioral advertising:
digitalAdvertisingAlliance.canada: In Canada: AdChoices: Digital Advertising Alliance of Canada (DAAC) / Choix de Pub: l'Alliance de la publicité numérique du Canada (DAAC)
digitalAdvertisingAlliance.usa: In the U.S.: Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA)

sectionB.moreInfo: For more information about your options regarding your personal information, see Idilio.tv/help/data-rights.
sectionB.contactQuestions: Contact and questions: if you wish to exercise any of your rights, or have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact our Data Protection Officer/Privacy Office at privacy@Idilio.tv.

sectionC.title: Section C: Account access and profiles
sectionC.sharingAccountContent: If you share your IDILIO.TV account with other people in your household, make sure they are aware of this Privacy Notice and have read it. This Privacy Notice applies to the use that such people make of IDILIO.TV (except in sections that only apply to the account holder, such as those related to payments). Please note that the account holder controls the IDILIO.TV account and all associated profiles, the account information and all profiles, and can decide to share (or stop sharing) the account with individuals in your household. If you share or allow others to have access to your account, they may be able to see viewing information, account information available in the "Account" section of the service, and information related to games such as chat content and saved game data. sectionC.removeDeviceAccessContent: To remove access to your IDILIO.TV account from devices that have logged into the account, visit the "Account" section of our website, locate the "Sign out of all devices" option, and follow the instructions to sign out of your devices. Users of public or shared devices should sign out at the end of each session. If you sell or return a computer or IDILIO.TV-compatible device, make sure to sign out first. If you, or other users on your account, do not maintain the security of your email address, password, and logged-in devices, or do not sign out of a device you sell or return, then other people may access your IDILIO.TV account, including your personal information.

sectionD.title: Section D: Cookies and other Technologies
sectionD.intro: We, our Service Providers, IDILIO.TV Marketing Providers, and Advertising Companies use cookies, other similar technologies (such as pixel tags), encrypted identifiers, and resettable device identifiers for various reasons. In this section we explain the types of technologies used, what they do, and the corresponding options you have. (We currently do not respond to "Do Not Track" signals sent by web browsers.)
sectionD.cookiesTitle: Cookies and similar technologies, pixel tags, encrypted identifiers, and resettable device identifiers
sectionD.cookiesContent: A cookie's text contains a string of numbers and letters that can uniquely identify your device, and may also contain other information. This allows the web server to recognize your browser each time you connect to that server. We use other technologies, such as browser storage and plugins. Like cookies, these other technologies can store small amounts of data on your device. Pixel tags often work together with cookies. In many cases, rejecting cookies will affect the effectiveness of pixel tags associated with those cookies. We can also create, use, and disclose encrypted identifiers. As described above, hashing is a process of converting original contact information (such as an email address or phone number) into a value (typically a long alphanumeric sequence) that by itself cannot reveal your identity or contact information. If you use an IDILIO.TV app (such as the main IDILIO.TV app or an IDILIO.TV game app) on a mobile device, tablet, or streaming device, we may collect a resettable device identifier from your device. Resettable device identifiers can be used similarly to cookies and are found on many mobile devices and tablets, and on certain streaming devices.
sectionD.whyUseTitle: Why does IDILIO.TV use these technologies?
sectionD.whyUseContent: We use these types of technologies for various reasons, including: provide our service; manage and operate our business; research, analyze, and improve our services (for example, improve site performance, monitor visitor traffic and actions on our site, and test the effectiveness of our user interface); send informational and marketing messages (for example, deliver and adapt our marketing, and understand interactions with our emails, marketing, and marketing on third-party services); support Ads; security, protection, and fraud prevention; and comply with the law and enforce the IDILIO.TV Terms of Use. These technologies allow IDILIO.TV Marketing Providers to collect personal information when you use our services, and IDILIO.TV Marketing Providers may also collect information about your online activities over time and across different websites. We use pixel tags in our emails to understand how members interact with our service. Our use of pixel tags helps us know when links within messages are clicked, or when emails are opened. IDILIO.TV uses encrypted identifiers and resettable device identifiers to show marketing of our service or IDILIO.TV content on third-party services, to support Ads (including delivering Ads to you), and for analysis and optimization purposes.
sectionD.howToExerciseTitle: How can I exercise options regarding these technologies?

cookiesOptions.title: To exercise options regarding cookies
cookiesOptions.content: for more information about cookies set through our service and to exercise options regarding cookies, click here (see our Cookie Preferences). Note: We currently do not respond to "Do Not Track" signals sent by web browsers.

hashedIdentifiersOptions.title: To exercise options regarding encrypted identifiers for IDILIO.TV marketing
hashedIdentifiersOptions.content: to exercise options regarding IDILIO.TV's use of encrypted identifiers for IDILIO.TV marketing communications on third-party services, please configure the appropriate option in "Communications with matching identifiers" within "Privacy and data settings" (for the corresponding profile) in the "Account" section of our website.

deviceIdentifiersOptions.title: To exercise options regarding resettable device identifiers
deviceIdentifiersOptions.content: to exercise options regarding IDILIO.TV's use of resettable device identifiers (for IDILIO.TV service marketing or IDILIO.TV content marketing, or as used to support Ads), configure the appropriate option on your device (generally located in "privacy" or "ads" in your device settings). If you decide not to allow this, you may still see marketing messages that promote IDILIO.TV and Ads on that device, but they will not be selected based on the use of a resettable device identifier. Please note that your choice regarding the resettable device identifier is specific to that device.

otherTechnologiesOptions.title: To exercise options regarding other similar technologies
otherTechnologiesOptions.content: in addition to any options we may offer you within the IDILIO.TV service, there are several ways to exercise options regarding technologies similar to cookies, such as browser storage and plugins (for example, HTML5, IndexedDB, and WebSQL). For example, many popular browsers offer the ability to clear browser storage, typically in the settings or preferences area. See your browser's help function or support area for more information. Other technologies can be removed from the app itself.

sectionD.additionalOptions: In addition to these options, if you wish to exercise your options for behavioral advertising on IDILIO.TV, please see the "Advertising options" section above.

sectionE.title: Section E: Other important privacy disclosures
sectionE.sharingFeaturesContent: You may use the sharing features available on our service to disclose your personal information in the following ways: Certain parts of our service may provide you with options to share information by email, text message, and social or other sharing applications, using the clients and applications on your device; and Social plugins and similar technologies that allow you to share information. Social plugins and social applications are operated by third-party social networks, and are subject to their terms of use and privacy policies. Similarly, some IDILIO.TV game features may require the use of a third-party service, which is subject to that service's terms of use and privacy policy.
sectionE.securityContent: We use reasonable administrative, logical, physical, and management measures to protect your personal information against loss, theft, as well as unauthorized access, use, and modification. These measures are designed to provide a level of security appropriate to the risks of processing your personal information.
sectionE.retentionContent: We may retain personal information as required or permitted by applicable laws and regulations, including to respect your choices, for our billing or record-keeping purposes, and as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Notice. In particular, we retain personal information for the time necessary to provide our service; to manage and operate our business; to research, analyze, and improve our services; to send informational and marketing messages; to support Ads; for security, protection, and fraud prevention; and to comply with the law and enforce the IDILIO.TV Terms of Use. Our retention of personal information is based on many factors, such as your relationship with IDILIO.TV, the nature of the personal information, our legal obligations, and the need to defend or resolve current or anticipated legal claims. We take reasonable measures to securely destroy or de-identify personal information when it is no longer necessary. For information about personal information retention periods, please see Idilio.tv/help/data-retention
sectionE.otherSitesContent: The IDILIO.TV service may be used, or may be provided, through features operated by third-party platforms (for example, social media content viewing, or voice control provision), or contain links to sites operated by third parties. Additionally, you may find third-party applications that interact with the IDILIO.TV service. These third parties have their own privacy policies. For example, you may access the IDILIO.TV service through platforms such as Smart TVs, mobile devices, set-top boxes, gaming systems, and other Internet-connected devices. These platforms have their own privacy statements or notices and terms of use, which we recommend you review. We may also provide support for the IDILIO.TV service (such as an online support forum for IDILIO.TV customer service or for a particular IDILIO.TV game). Information you post or make available on such sites and forums is publicly accessible (unless otherwise indicated on the site or forum).
sectionE.minorsContent: You must be at least 18 years old (or the age of majority in your country of residence) to subscribe to the IDILIO.TV service. People under that age may only use the service with the participation, supervision, and approval of one of their parents or legal guardian. To help parents or guardians, we have several parental controls available; you can get more information here: Idilio.tv/help/parental-controls.
sectionE.changesContent: We will update this Privacy Notice periodically in response to changing legal, regulatory, or operational requirements. We will provide notice of such changes (including when they will take effect) as required by law. Your continued use of the IDILIO.TV service after such updates take effect will constitute your acknowledgment and (to the extent applicable) acceptance of those changes. If you do not wish to acknowledge or accept the updates to this Privacy Notice, you may cancel your account. To see when this Privacy Notice was last updated, see the Last updated date below.

sectionF.title: Section F: Supplemental privacy disclosures for certain services
sectionF.gamesIntro: When you play IDILIO.TV games, we will collect, use, and disclose your personal information as described in the IDILIO.TV Privacy Notice. gamesAccountProfile.content: information associated with your IDILIO.TV account/profile, such as your selection of your friends list or teams and the names of those teams, when you use functions such as local multiplayer (for example, when other players connect to your "IDILIO.TV Game on TV" by scanning a code on the TV) and online multiplayer (when you interact with other online players who have logged into their IDILIO.TV accounts).

sectionF.gamesHowWeUseTitle: How we use your personal information

gamesProvideService.content: we use the personal information necessary to provide the game and the functions described below, including: IDILIO.TV account/profile information, usage information, and device and network information. cancellation.content: Usted puede cancelar su membresía en cualquier momento. Si cancela, continuará teniendo acceso al contenido de Idilio.tv hasta el final de su período de facturación ya pagado. En la medida permitida por la legislación aplicable, los pagos de suscripción no son reembolsables y no otorgamos reembolsos o créditos por periodos parciales usados ni por contenido no visualizado.
